translations: 颜色最蓝的；最忧郁的，最沮丧的；最保守的（blue 的最高级）

sentences.sentence: That book turned out to be "The Bluest Eye", published in 1970.
sentences.translation: 那本名为“至蓝之眼”的书，于1970年出版。

sentences.sentence: Father the sun climbed in the bluest of blue sky, it is already noon!
sentences.translation: 太阳公公爬到了蓝蓝的天空中，已经是中午了！

sentences.sentence: In the last part of the bluest of blue skies, but the sky there are a number of yellow clouds, I do not know why?
sentences.translation: 在最后一部分是蓝蓝的天空，但是天空上却有一些黄色的云，我也不知道为什么？
